title: Idris Elba just got schooled on dating by some absolutely adorable little kids
text:
Idris Elba just got schooled on dating by some absolutely adorable little kids Valentine‚Äôs Day is right around the corner, which means it‚Äôs time to brush up on your romance skills if they‚Äôre a little rusty. Even if you‚Äôre not out of practice, we can all use a little love advice ‚Äî and so can Idris Elba, who recruited a crew of kids to help him get in the Valentine‚Äôs spirit. In the Elba‚Äôs raffling off a date with him and cupid. From the looks of this video, he wants to make it the best date ever.

That‚Äôs good, because we‚Äôre determined to be Idris Elba‚Äôs Valentine.

And honestly, we like the advice we‚Äôre hearing.
‚ÄúYou take the girl somewhere nice, like somewhere she likes, like a girl concert‚Ä¶. You pay for everything and you agree with everything she says.‚Äù
They‚Äôve also got words of wisdom on how to tell someone you like them, whether Idris should lean into the good guy or bad boy role, and what food you should order (not beans). Check it out.
The best part has got to be when one boy volunteers his mom to be Elba‚Äôs Valentine. Way to do mom a solid, little man. ‚ÄúI‚Äôve got a pretty good idea of what makes an absolutely romantic dinner for two,‚Äù Idris finishes in the video, ‚Äúincluding drinks, dinner, and the criss cross dance.‚Äù
The secret is out. I want YOU to be my Valentine. And yes, you can pound my yams. But can you steal my heart? Enter at the link in my bio or go to omaze.com/idris for YOUR chance to steal my heart. It‚Äôs all to support W.E. Can Lead, an incredible cause that empowers and educates girls throughout Africa. A photo posted by Idris Elba (@idriselba) on Jan 18, 2017 at 2:57am PST
